verses.verse: Do We Begin <S%G756><s%> Again <S%G3825><s%> Ourselves <S%G1438><s%> To Commend? <S%G4921><s%> <S%G1487><s%> Unless <S%G3361><s%> We Need, <S%G5535><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Some, <S%G5100><s%> Commendatory <S%G4956><s%> Epistles <S%G1992><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> You, <S%G5209><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> From <S%G1537><s%> You <S%G5216><s%> Commendatory Ones? <S%G4956><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> <S%G1992><s%> Our Epistle <S%G2257><s%> Ye <S%G5210><s%> Are, <S%G2075><s%> Having Been Inscribed <S%G1449><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2588><s%> Our Hearts, <S%G2257><s%> Being Known <S%G1097><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Being Read <S%G314><s%> By <S%G5259><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Men, <S%G444><s%>

Being Manifested <S%G5319><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Ye Are <S%G2075><s%> Epistle <S%G1992><s%> Christ's, <S%G5547><s%> Ministered <S%G1247><s%> ' By <S%G5259><s%> Us; <S%G2257><s%> Having Been Inscribed, <S%G1449><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> With Ink, <S%G3188><s%> But <S%G235><s%> With The Spirit <S%G4151><s%> Of God The <S%G2316><s%> Living; <S%G2198><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> On <S%G1722><s%> Tablets <S%G4109><s%> Of Stone, <S%G3035><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> On <S%G1722><s%> Tablets <S%G4109><s%> Of The Heart <S%G2588><s%> Fleshy. <S%G4560><s%>

Confidence <S%G4006><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> Such <S%G5108><s%> Have We <S%G2192><s%> Through <S%G1223><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Towards <S%G4314><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God : <S%G2316><s%>

Not <S%G3756><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Competent <S%G2425><s%> We Are <S%G2070><s%> ' From <S%G575><s%> Ourselves <S%G1438><s%> To Reckon <S%G3049><s%> Anything <S%G5100><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> Ourselves, <S%G1438><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2426><s%> Our Competency <S%G2257><s%> Is Of <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God; <S%G2316><s%>

Who <S%G3739><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Made Competent <S%G2427><s%> Us As <S%G2248><s%> Servants <S%G1249><s%> Of A New <S%G2537><s%> Covenant; <S%G1242><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Of Letter, <S%G1121><s%> But <S%G235><s%> Of Spirit; <S%G4151><s%> <S%G3588><s%> For The <S%G1063><s%> Letter <S%G1121><s%>, Kills, <S%G615><s%> <S%G3588><s%> But The <S%G1161><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> Quickens. <S%G2227><s%>

<S%G1487><s%> But If <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Service <S%G1248><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Death <S%G2288><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Letters, <S%G1121><s%> Having Been Engraven <S%G1795><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Stones, <S%G3037><s%> Was Produced <S%G1096><s%> With <S%G1722><s%> Glory, <S%G1391><s%> So As <S%G5620><s%> <S%G3361><s%> Not To Be Able To <S%G1410><s%> Look Intently <S%G816><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Children <S%G5207><s%> Of Israel <S%G2474><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Face <S%G4383><s%> Of Moses, <S%G3475><s%> On Account Of <S%G1223><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Glory <S%G1391><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4383><s%> Of His Face, <S%G846><s%> Which <S%G3588><s%> Is Being Annulled; <S%G2673><s%>
How <S%G4459><s%> Not <S%G3780><s%> Rather <S%G3123><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Service <S%G1248><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> Shall Be <S%G2071><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Glory? <S%G1391><s%>

<S%G1487><s%> For If <S%G1063><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Service <S%G1248><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Condemnation Be <S%G2633><s%> Glory, <S%G1391><s%> Much <S%G4183><s%> Rather <S%G3123><s%> Abounds <S%G4052><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Service <S%G1248><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Righteousness <S%G1343><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Glory. <S%G1391><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> For Even <S%G1063><s%> Neither <S%G3761><s%> Has Been Made Glorious <S%G1392><s%> That Which <S%G3588><s%> Has Been Made Glorious <S%G1392><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> This <S%G5129><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Respect, <S%G3313><s%> On Account Of <S%G1752><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Surpassing <S%G5235><s%> Glory. <S%G1391><s%>

<S%G1487><s%> For If <S%G1063><s%> That Which <S%G3588><s%> Is Being Annulled Was <S%G2673><s%> Through <S%G1223><s%> Glory, <S%G1391><s%> Much <S%G4183><s%> Rather <S%G3123><s%> That Which <S%G3588><s%> Remains Is <S%G3306><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Glory. <S%G1391><s%>
Having <S%G2192><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Such <S%G5108><s%> Hope, <S%G1680><s%> Much <S%G4183><s%> Boldness <S%G3954><s%> We Use : <S%G5530><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> According As <S%G2509><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> Put <S%G5087><s%> A Veil <S%G2571><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Face <S%G4383><s%>, Of Himself, <S%G1438><s%> For <S%G4314><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> To Look Intensity <S%G816><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sons <S%G5207><s%> Of Israel <S%G2474><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> End <S%G5056><s%> At That <S%G3588><s%> Being Annulled. <S%G2673><s%>

' But <S%G235><s%> Were Hardened <S%G4456><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3540><s%> Their Thoughts, <S%G846><s%> <S%G891><s%> For Unto <S%G1063><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Present <S%G4594><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Same <S%G846><s%> Veil <S%G2571><s%> At <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Reading <S%G320><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Old <S%G3820><s%> Covenant <S%G1242><s%> Remains, <S%G3306><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Uncovered, <S%G343><s%> <S%G3739><s%> Which <S%G5100><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Is Being Annulled. <S%G2673><s%>

' But <S%G235><s%> Unto <S%G2193><s%> This Day, <S%G4594><s%> When <S%G2259><s%> Is Read <S%G314><s%>, Moses, <S%G3475><s%> A Veil <S%G2571><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2588><s%> Their Heart <S%G846><s%> Lies. <S%G2749><s%>
<S%G2259><s%> ' <S%G1161><s%> But When <S%G302><s%> It Shail Have Turned <S%G1994><s%> To The <S%G4314><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> Is Taken Away <S%G4014><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Veil. <S%G2571><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> Now The <S%G1161><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> Is; <S%G2076><s%> <S%G3757><s%> And Where <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> Of The Lord Is, <S%G2962><s%> There Is <S%G1563><s%> Freedom. <S%G1657><s%>

<S%G2249><s%> But We <S%G1161><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> With Uncovered <S%G343><s%> Face <S%G4383><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Glory <S%G1391><s%> Of The Lord <S%G2962><s%> Beholding As In A Mirror, To <S%G2734><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Same <S%G846><s%> Image <S%G1504><s%> Are Being Transformed <S%G3339><s%> From <S%G575><s%> Glory <S%G1391><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Glory, <S%G1391><s%> Even As <S%G2509><s%> From The <S%G575><s%> Lord The <S%G2962><s%> Spirit. <S%G4151><s%>
